text: @MarshaBlackburn Thoughts and prayers are the @GOP solution. Not accepting responsibility.  Not listening to the experts and taking well-thought-out actions. Not truth-telling.  Any chance @senatemajldr could call you guys back from your paid vacay to vote on #coronavirus   relief legislation?
